languages.text: "На тот момент мне не в чем было покаяться, поэтому я надиктовала отрывок из одного старого письма к моей матери. Как вы могли слышать, там были аргументы в пользу заведения на корабле нескольких вислоухих клепп. До сих пор прекрасно помню его наизусть".

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."
languages.original_text: "На тот момент мне не в чем было покаяться, поэтому я надиктовала отрывок из одного старого письма к моей матери. Как вы могли слышать, там были аргументы в пользу заведения на корабле нескольких вислоухих клепп. До сих пор прекрасно помню его наизусть".

traits.locale_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I read aloud an excerpt from an old letter addressed to my mother. As you could hear, it contained arguments in favour of keeping a number of lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I could still recite it from memory."

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I read aloud an excerpt from an old letter addressed to my mother. As you could hear, it contained arguments in favour of keeping a number of lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I could still recite it from memory."

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

"At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

languages.text: « Je n'avais rien à confesser à ce moment-là, alors j'ai dicté un extrait d'une ancienne lettre adressée à ma mère. Comme vous avez pu l'entendre, elle parlait de l'intérêt de garder des kleppas à oreilles tombantes à bord du vaisseau. Je pourrais même vous la réciter de mémoire, si vous voulez. »
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'avais rien à confesser à ce moment-là, alors j'ai lu un extrait d'une ancienne lettre adressée à ma mère. Comme vous avez pu l'entendre, elle parlait de l'intérêt de garder un certain nombre de kleppas à oreilles tombantes à bord du vaisseau. Je pourrais même vous la réciter de mémoire, si vous voulez. »

languages.text: «En ese momento no tenía nada de lo que arrepentirme, de modo que dicté unas frases de una vieja carta que envié a mi madre. Como ha oído, contenía argumentos a favor de mantener kleppas de orejas caídas en la nave. Aún puedo recitarlos de memoria».
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

traits.locale_text: «En ese momento no tenía nada de lo que arrepentirme, de modo que leí unas frases de una vieja carta que envié a mi madre. Como has oído, contenía argumentos a favor de mantener algunos kleppas de orejas caídas en la nave. Podría recitarlos de memoria».

languages.text: “因为我当时想不到有什么可告解的东西，于是我只好大声朗读之前写给母亲的信其中的一段。正如您听到的那样，这段内容讲的是在船上饲养垂耳克莱珀都有哪些好处，我现在还能凭记忆背下来呢。”
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

traits.locale_text: “因为我当时想不到有什么可告解的东西，于是我只好大声朗读之前写给母亲的信其中的一段。正如您听到的那样，这段内容讲的是为什么要在船上饲养垂耳克莱珀，我还能凭记忆背下来呢。”

languages.text: 「その時、私は何も悔いることがなかったので、母に古い手紙の一部を音読しました。その手紙には、ロップイヤークレッパを船で飼うことに賛成する主張がありました。私は今でもその一文を、暗唱することができます」
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

traits.locale_text: 「その時、私は何も悔いることがなかったので、母に古い手紙の一部を音読しました。その手紙には、ロップイヤークレッパを船で飼うことに賛成する主張がありました。私は今でもその一文を、暗唱することができます」

languages.text: "Ich hatte damals nichts, wofür ich hätte Buße tun müssen, also habe ich einen Auszug aus einem alten Brief an meine Mutter diktiert. Wie Ihr gehört habt, enthielt er Argumente dafür, auf dem Schiff Hängeohr-Kleppas zu halten. Ich kann ihn noch immer auswendig."
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte damals nichts, wofür ich hätte Buße tun müssen, also habe ich einen Auszug aus einem alten Brief an meine Mutter laut vorgelesen. Wie Ihr hören konntet, enthielt er Argumente dafür, auf dem Schiff Hängeohr-Kleppas zu halten. Ich konnte ihn noch immer auswendig."

languages.text: "O sırada tövbe edeceğim hiçbir şey yoktu. Ben de anneme yazdığım eski bir mektuptaki bir paragrafı okudum. Duyduğunuz üzere dal kulaklı kleppaları gemide tutmak üzerine argümanlar içeriyor. Hâlâ ezberden okuyabilirim."
languages.original_text: "At that time, I had nothing to repent of, so I dictated an excerpt from an old letter to my mother. As you heard, it contained arguments in favour of keeping lop-eared kleppas on the ship. I can still recite it from memory."
